attributes.action: Climate donations to come from Overseas Aid budget
attributes.additional_details:
Almost £1Bn from the Climate Action Fund Britain has generously donated to has been used to build coal fired electricity generation plant in Indonesia.
http://www.newsweek.com/oopsie-1-billion-un-funds-fight-climate-change-built-coal-power-plants-instead-288497

'Climate action' funding is therefore indistinguishable from overseas aid and should come from the overseas aid budget which has now been fixed at 0.7% of UK gdp by law.
